item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, March 18, 2025 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Two new PebbleOS watches (704 points | 263 comments)
2. Apple restricts Pebble from being awesome with iPhones (835 points | 499 comments)
3. Show HN: I made a tool to port tweets to Bluesky mantaining their original date (179 points | 65 comments)
4. Nvidia Dynamo: A Datacenter Scale Distributed Inference Serving Framework (13 points | discuss)
5. HTTrack Website Copier (79 points | 13 comments)
6. A Tale of Four Kernels [pdf] (10 points | discuss)
7. US appeals court rules AI generated art cannot be copyrighted (257 points | 161 comments)
8. Google to buy Wiz for $32B (316 points | 506 comments)
9. Designing Electronics That Work (72 points | 22 comments)
10. Preview: Amazon S3 Tables and Lakehouse in DuckDB (82 points | 25 comments)
11. Amazon to kill off local Alexa processing, all voice requests shipped to cloud (250 points | 71 comments)
12. FTC Removes Posts Critical of Amazon, Microsoft, and AI Companies (190 points | 48 comments)
13. PeerTube v7.1 Is Out (69 points | 11 comments)
14. Spaceium Inc (YC S24) Is Hiring a Software Engineer ( | hide)
15. The race is on to build the most complex machine (53 points | 21 comments)
16. Verification-First Development (26 points | 8 comments)
17. This is no world for an axolotl (42 points | 15 comments)
18. Fedora 42 Beta (121 points | 56 comments)
19. Show HN: "Git who" – A new CLI tool for industrial-scale Git blaming (4 points | 1 comment)
20. Rust on the RP2350 (2024) (112 points | 27 comments)
21. Show HN: I made a live multiplayer Minesweeper game (142 points | 58 comments)
22. Stamina Is a Quiet Advantage (125 points | 56 comments)
23. SheepIt Render Farm server code goes open source (121 points | 17 comments)
24. Practical Process Control: Methods and Best Practices for Automatic PID Control (23 points | 1 comment)
25. 20 Years of YC / HN (59 points | 13 comments)
26. Block YouTube ads on AppleTV by decrypting and stripping ads from Profobuf (2022) (609 points | 373 comments)
27. Learning to Love Dandelions (2021) (8 points | 7 comments)
28. Underrated Soft Skills: Charisma (63 points | 66 comments)
29. Show HN: I converted my notebook into a searchable database of IT keywords (47 points | 20 comments)
30. The Dark Crystal: Age of Resistance Is a Stone-Cold Masterpiece (173 points | 89 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, March 18, 2025 at 9:15 PM UTC
